Netlify Plugin Demo: add-instagram

Fetch and cache data from resources ready for a static site generator to use

This site demonstrates netlify-plugin-add-instagram, a Build plugin for Netlify. The code for this site in available in on GitHub.

When this site is builds, the build plugin requests (and caches for future builds) data and image assets from Instagram. those images can then be served as part of this site. Subsequent build get available image assets from the build cache.

Recent Instagram posts

Sourced from Phil's Instagram, but serve from the Netlify CDN along with this site.

Quick try-out

To quickly experiment with this plugin, you can click the button below. Clicking the button will clone this test site repo, setup a new site on Netlify and deploy the site complete with the plugin configured and operational.

Made with by the Netlify team. Explore the code in GitHub.
